languages.text: {n}Офицеры переглядываются.{/n} "Мы и не думали скрывать это от вас. Лорд-капитан Теодора не изволила участвовать в столь незначительном для ее позиции деле, как пополнение живой силы. Ее интересовало лишь одно — чтобы в службе подданных не было никаких заминок. Мы всегда решали вопросы заполнения позиций самостоятельно — без привлечения вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Офицеры переглядываются.{/n} "Мы и не думали скрывать это от вас. Ее Светлость Теодора не изволила участвовать в найме матросов — поэтому мы вам не сообщали. Однако она утвердила этот план — для экономии средств из казны".

languages.text: {n}The officers exchange glances.{/n} "We did not intend to hide it from you. Lord Captain Theodora did not deign to involve herself in so trifling a matter as replenishing her workforce. She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."
languages.original_text: {n}Офицеры переглядываются.{/n} "Мы и не думали скрывать это от вас. Лорд-капитан Теодора не изволила участвовать в столь незначительном для ее позиции деле, как пополнение живой силы. Ее интересовало лишь одно — чтобы в службе подданных не было никаких заминок. Мы всегда решали вопросы заполнения позиций самостоятельно — без привлечения вас".

She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without your involvement."

She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without your involvement."

She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without your involvement."

She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."

languages.text: {n}士官たちは互いに視線を交わした。{/n}「隠すつもりはありませんでした。ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラは、労働力の補充のような些細な件にご自身が関与なさるようなお方ではありませんでした。ただ、船の運行に支障が出ないようにすることだけに関心をお持ちだったのです。クルーの任命について、私たちは常にあなたの関与なしに独自で対処してまいりました」
languages.original_text: {n}The officers exchange glances.{/n} "We did not intend to hide it from you. Lord Captain Theodora did not deign to involve herself in so trifling a matter as replenishing her workforce. She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官たちは互いに視線を交わした。{/n}「隠すつもりはありませんでした。ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラは、労働力の補充のような些細な件にご自身が関与なさるようなお方ではありませんでした。ただ、船の運行に支障が出ないようにすることだけに関心をお持ちだったのです。クルーの任命について、私たちは常にあなたの関与なしに独自で対処してまいりました」

languages.text: {n}Subaylar birbirlerine bakıyor.{/n} "Niyetimiz bu değildi. Lord Kaptan Theodora, iş gücünü desteklemek gibi önemsiz bir meseleye el atmaya tenezzül etmezdi. Kendisi yalnızca geminin işleyişinin kesintisiz devamını sağlamakla ilgileniyordu. Mürettebat atamalarını daima kendi başımıza, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri olmadan gerçekleştirdik."
languages.original_text: {n}The officers exchange glances.{/n} "We did not intend to hide it from you. Lord Captain Theodora did not deign to involve herself in so trifling a matter as replenishing her workforce. She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Subaylar birbirlerine bakarlar.{/n} "Niyetimiz bu yönde değildi. Lord Kaptan Theodora, iş gücünü desteklemek gibi önemsiz bir meseleye el atmaya tenezzül etmedi. Kendisi yalnızca geminin işleyişinin kesintisiz devamını sağlamakla ilgileniyordu. Mürettebat atamalarını ise biz daima kendi başımıza, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri olmadan gerçekleştirdik."

languages.text: {n}Los oficiales se miran.{/n} «No era nuestra intención ocultárselo. La Lord Capitán Theodora no se dignaba a tratar asuntos tan triviales como reponer sus efectivos. Solo le importaba que no hubiera ninguna interrupción en el buen funcionamiento de la nave. Siempre nos habíamos ocupado de los nombramientos de la tripulación sin la participación de mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The officers exchange glances.{/n} "We did not intend to hide it from you. Lord Captain Theodora did not deign to involve herself in so trifling a matter as replenishing her workforce. She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los oficiales se miran.{/n} «No era nuestra intención ocultárselo. La Lord Capitán Theodora no se dignaba a tratar asuntos tan triviales como reponer sus efectivos. Solo le importaba que no hubiera ninguna interrupción en el buen funcionamiento de la nave. Siempre nos habíamos ocupado de los nombramientos de la tripulación sin la participación de mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}三位军官交换了一下眼色。{/n}“我们并非有意对您隐瞒这些事情。西奥多拉夫人还在的时候，她根本不愿意屈尊了解补充劳力这种细枝末节，她只关心船能否正常运行。正因如此，我们始终都在独立处理船员的任命工作，不敢用这些小事劳烦您，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officers exchange glances.{/n} "We did not intend to hide it from you. Lord Captain Theodora did not deign to involve herself in so trifling a matter as replenishing her workforce. She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."

traits.locale_text: {n}三位军官交换了一下眼色。{/n}“我们并非有意对您隐瞒这些事情。西奥多拉夫人还在的时候，她根本不愿意屈尊了解补充劳力这种细枝末节，她只关心船能否正常运行。正因如此，我们始终都在独立处理船员的任命工作，不敢用这些小事劳烦您，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Les officiers échangent un regard.{/n} « Nous n'avions pas l'intention de vous cacher ceci. La seigneure-capitaine Théodora ne s'abaissait pas à suivre des sujets aussi insignifiants que le recrutement de la main-d'œuvre. La seule chose qui lui importait, c'était que le vaisseau dispose d'un équipage suffisant pour rester parfaitement fonctionnel. Nous avons toujours assuré notre recrutement par nous-mêmes, sans chercher à importuner Votre seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officers exchange glances.{/n} "We did not intend to hide it from you. Lord Captain Theodora did not deign to involve herself in so trifling a matter as replenishing her workforce. She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les officiers échangent un regard.{/n} « Nous n'avions pas l'intention de vous cacher ceci. La seigneure-capitaine Théodora ne s'abaissait pas à suivre des sujets aussi insignifiants que le recrutement de la main-d'œuvre. La seule chose qui lui importait, c'était que le vaisseau dispose d'un équipage suffisant pour rester parfaitement fonctionnel. Nous avons toujours assuré notre recrutement par nous-mêmes, sans chercher à importuner Votre seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Die Offiziere tauschen unsichere Blicke aus.{/n} "Es war nicht unsere Absicht, Euch etwas zu verschweigen. Lord Captain Theodora hielt es nicht für nötig, sich mit so trivialen Angelegenheiten wie der Rekrutierung von Arbeitern zu befassen. Sie war lediglich daran interessiert, einen reibungslosen Betrieb des Schiffs zu gewährleisten. Wir haben uns daher stets selbst um die Organisation der Crew gekümmert, ohne Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} damit zu behelligen."
languages.original_text: {n}The officers exchange glances.{/n} "We did not intend to hide it from you. Lord Captain Theodora did not deign to involve herself in so trifling a matter as replenishing her workforce. She was only interested in ensuring that there were no interruptions in the running of the ship. We have always handled crew appointments on our own, without Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s involvement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Offiziere tauschen unsichere Blicke aus.{/n} "Es war nicht unsere Absicht, Euch etwas zu verschweigen. Lord Captain Theodora hielt es nicht für nötig, sich mit so trivialen Angelegenheiten wie der Rekrutierung von Arbeitern zu befassen. Sie war lediglich daran interessiert, einen reibungslosen Betrieb des Schiffs zu gewährleisten. Wir haben uns daher stets selbst um die Organisation der Crew gekümmert, ohne Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} damit zu behelligen."
